faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How do I place an order?
faq.a1: Choose your occasion (Qurban, Aqiqah, or Personal), then pick sheep or goat, half or whole, and your preferred cut. Add to cart and complete your order via WhatsApp — we'll confirm and arrange delivery.
faq.a2: Yes. All our animals are slaughtered according to Islamic requirements with full traceability. We can provide video proof of slaughter on request.
faq.a3: We deliver to your address on the date you choose via Lalamove. Slaughter date and distribution (delivery, pickup, or donate) are set in the order flow.
faq.a4: You can choose from our special cuts (e.g. leg cut, shoulder cut) or whole (no cut). Options are shown in step 4 of the order. If you have a specific request (e.g. curry cut, stew cut), add it in the notes and we'll do our best to accommodate.
faq.q5: What do I need for an Aqiqah order?
faq.a5: Aqiqah is traditionally offered on the seventh day after birth, but we're flexible with timing. You choose sheep or goat, half or whole, and your preferred cut. We handle slaughter and preparation according to your wishes; you can add any special requests in the notes.
faq.q6: What do I need for a Qurban order?
faq.a6: Qurban is for Eid al-Adha. Place your order in advance; we arrange slaughter on the designated days. You choose distribution: delivery to your address (via Lalamove), pickup, or donate. We'll confirm dates and details via WhatsApp.
faq.q7: Where do your sheep and goats come from?
faq.a7: Our sheep and goats are sourced from trusted local farms. We work with selected suppliers who meet our standards for animal welfare and halal compliance, with full traceability from farm to you.
faq.a8: Our 7-step flow ensures a clear experience: (1) Choose occasion — Qurban, Aqiqah, or Personal. (2) Sheep or goat. (3) Half or whole. (4) Choose your cut. (5) Slaughter date and distribution. (6) Extras (e.g. name tag, video proof). (7) Notes. You confirm each step, add to cart, then complete via WhatsApp.
faq.q9: What payment options do you accept?
faq.a9: We accept bank transfer only. After you send your order via WhatsApp we'll confirm and share our bank details. Payment is arranged with you before or around the time of your order.
